metadata.title: CVE-2017-9055 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue, also known as DW201703-001, was discovered in libdwarf 2017-03-21. In dwarf_formsdata() a few data types were not checked for being in bounds, leading to a heap-based buffer over-read.

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20180129-1').
